body_html:
Before we go into details, I am wondering whether shuffle is the best name. I associate shuffling with some sort of random permutation being applied, which clearly isn't the case here.

The example in the docstring didn't really make it clear to me, it just looks like reshape (and so does the test), can you explain what this actually does?
body_text:

body:
Before we go into details, I am wondering whether shuffle is the best name. I associate shuffling with some sort of random permutation being applied, which clearly isn't the case here.

The example in the docstring didn't really make it clear to me, it just looks like reshape (and so does the test), can you explain what this actually does?
